mapper.select: select from MS_EXAMINE_DETAIL where GATHER_DATE >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss') AND GATHER_DATE <= to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss')
mapper.sql: id, ehr_id, person_id, record_number, sample_id, inspection_type, inspection_item_code, inspection_item_name, inspection_quantify_result, inspection_result, inspection_unit, reference_range, prompt, conclusion, check_date, detection_people_name, detection_org_name, detection_room_code, detection_room_name, update_name, update_idcard, update_date, is_delete, examination_number, ex_proj_sn, ucl, lcl, analysis_status, is_limit, hospital_code, gather_date, sputum_smear_posi, syphilis_posi, alanine_aspartate, hbv_dna_posi
